name: Biologus Putrifier

unit.name: Foul Infusion
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

unit.name: Extraction of Fresh Disease
unit.description: The first time this model’s unit destroys an enemy unit as the result of a melee attack, until the end of the battle, add 6 to the Objective Control characteristic of this model.

composition.description: 1 Biologus Putrifier This model is equipped with: hyper blight grenades; injector pistol; plague knives.

leader.name: Foul Infusion
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

leaderAttachableTo: Plague Marines You can attach this model to a PLAGUE MARINES unit
even if one other Leader unit has already been attached to it (you cannot attach more than one of the same leader to the same unit). If you do
and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed
the Leader units attached to it become separate units
with their original Starting Strengths .

unit.name: Death Guard Defenders
unit.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

unit.name: Fevered Strategist
unit.description: Once per battle round , one model from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly DEATH GUARD unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

unit.name: Miasma of Pestilence (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly DEATH GUARD unit is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

composition.description: 1 Daemon Prince of Nurgle This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

name: Daemon Prince of Nurgle with Wings

unit.name: Horrifying Visage
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it. That unit must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 1 from that test.

unit.name: Enfeebling Miasma (Aura)
unit.description: While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) is within 6" of this model, each time that unit is selected to Fall Back , models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests . When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked , subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

composition.description: 1 Daemon Prince of Nurgle with Wings This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

unit.name: Blinding Spray
unit.description: In the Fight phase , you can select one model from your army with this ability to use this ability. If you do, until the end of the phase, that model’s unit has the Fights First ability. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per battle.

unit.name: Putrefying Stink
unit.description: Enemy models cannot start or end an Advance move within 9" of this model.

composition.description: 1 Foul Blightspawn This model is equipped with: plague sprayer; close combat weapon.

unit.description: The first time a model with this ability is destroyed in a battle round , roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with 3 wounds remaining. Each model can only be set up in this way once per battle.

unit.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of the bearer, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

unit.name: Infected Outbreak
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

unit.name: Daemonic Icon
unit.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

unit.name: Instrument of Chaos
unit.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

composition.description: 1 Plagueridden 9 Plaguebearers Every model is equipped with: plaguesword.

unit.name: Fire Support
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll .

composition.description: 1 Chaos Rhino This model is equipped with: combi-bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Termite Assault
unit.description: This model must start the battle in Reserves , but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase , regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.

composition.description: 1 Terrax-pattern Termite This model is equipped with: Terrax melta cutter; 2 combi-bolters; Termite drill.

unit.name: Putrescent Fog (Aura)
unit.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

unit.name: Diseased Cover
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

unit.name: Fortification
unit.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army:  That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol , subtract 1 from the Hit roll . Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked , except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

composition.description: 1 Miasmic Malignifier This model is equipped with: miasmic gouts.

unit.name: Grotesque Regeneration
unit.description: At the end of each phase, if a Beasts of Nurgle model in this unit has lost any wounds but is not destroyed, that model regains all of its lost wounds.

composition.description: 1-2 Beasts of Nurgle Every model is equipped with: putrid appendages.

unit.name: Blistering Fusillade
unit.description: If this unit has a Starting Strength of 5 or more, or if a CHARACTER is leading this unit, then each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an Afflicted unit, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.

composition.description: 1 Blightlord Champion 2-9 Blightlord Terminators Every model is equipped with: combi-bolter; bubotic blade.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Land Raider This model is equipped with: 2 soulshatter lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is Afflicted ; on a 5+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds .

composition.description: 1 Chaos Predator Annihilator This model is equipped with: Predator twin lascannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Hail of Corrosive Disease
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly DEATH GUARD unit makes a ranged attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. The same enemy unit can only be affected by this ability once per phase.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Predator Destructor This model is equipped with: predator autocannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Lethal Ichor
unit.description: Each time a melee attack is allocated to a model in this unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to a maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 2 Chaos Spawn Every model is equipped with: hideous mutations.

unit.name: Silent Bodyguard
unit.description: While a CHARACTER model is leading this unit, that CHARACTER model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

unit.name: Death Approaches
unit.description: In your Movement phase , when this unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all Afflicted enemy units, and more than 9" horizontally away from all other enemy units.

unit.name: Icon of Despair (Aura)
unit.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of the bearer, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

composition.description: 1 Deathshroud Champion 2-5 Deathshroud Terminators Every model is equipped with: plaguespurt gauntlet; manreaper.

unit.description: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move , it can move through friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height.

unit.name: Barrage of Filth
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover .

composition.description: 1 Defiler This model is equipped with: battle cannon; reaper autocannon; twin heavy flamer; Defiler claws.

unit.name: Hovering Death

unit.description: In your Shooting phase , each time you select a target for this model’s Plagueburst mortar, roll one D6 for the target unit and every other enemy unit within 3" of the target unit, adding 1 to that roll if the unit being rolled for is Afflicted . On a 6+, the unit being rolled for is struck by spores; after resolving all of this model’s attacks against the target unit, each unit struck by spores suffers D3 mortal wounds .

composition.description: 1 Plagueburst Crawler This model is equipped with: 2 entropy cannons; heavy slugger; Plagueburst mortar; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Curse of the Walking Pox
unit.description: Each time a POXWALKER model in this unit makes an attack that destroys an enemy model (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models), after this unit has resolved its attacks, you can return one destroyed POXWALKER model to this unit.   While TYPHUS is leading this unit, enemy models destroyed as a result of TYPHUS ’ Eater Plague ability count as enemy models destroyed by an attack made by a POXWALKER model in this unit for the purposes of this ability.

composition.description: 10-20 Poxwalkers Every model is equipped with: improvised weapon.

unit.description: Each time the bearer ends a Normal move , you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 1 Deredeo Dreadnought This model is equipped with: anvilus autocannon battery; twin heavy bolter; armoured feet.

unit.name: Titan-killer
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack with its twin Falchion volcano cannon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Falchion This model is equipped with: 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; twin Falchion volcano cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Rolling Fortress
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fellblade model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

composition.description: 1 Fellblade This model is equipped with: demolisher cannon; Fellblade accelerator cannon; 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Strafing Run
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot Fly , add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Fire Raptor Gunship This model is equipped with: twin avenger bolt cannon; 2 twin autocannons; 2 twin hellstrike launchers; armoured hull

unit.name: Fearsome (Aura)
unit.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test , subtract 1 from the result.

composition.description: 4 Nightmare Hulks 3 Gellerpox Mutants Every Gellerpox Mutant is equipped with: brutal weapons. One Nightmare Hulk is equipped with: belly-flamer; hideous mutations. Every other Nightmare Hulk is equipped with: hideous mutations.

unit.name: Hovering Death
unit.description: This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back .

composition.description: 1 Greater Blight Drone This model is equipped with: bile maw; blightreaper cannon; greater plague probe.

unit.name: Interceptor
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY , add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Hell Blade This model is equipped with: 2 twin autocannons; armoured hull.

unit.name: Bomb Rack
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move , you can select one enemy unit it moved across during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 1 Hell Talon This model is equipped with: autocannon; twin lascannon; armoured hull.

unit.name: Line-breaker
unit.description: When making ranged attacks, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it with Blast weapons (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

composition.description: 1 Kratos This model is equipped with: autocannon; Kratos battle cannon; 4 heavy bolters; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Land Raider Achilles This model is equipped with: quad launcher; 2 twin volkite culverins; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

unit.name: Explorator Augury Web
unit.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of this bearer, but the bearer must halve its Transport Capacity .

composition.description: 1 Land Raider Proteus This model is equipped with: 2 twin lascannons; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Duty Eternal
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

composition.description: 1 Leviathan Dreadnought This model is equipped with: 2 heavy flamers; 2 grav-flux bombards; armoured feet.

unit.name: Inviolable Transport
unit.description: Once per battle round , when an attack is allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

composition.description: 1 Mastodon This model is equipped with: 2 heavy flamers; 2 lascannons; siege melta array; skyreaper battery; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Mischief Makers (Aura)
unit.description: While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

composition.description: 16 Mutoid Vermin Every model is equipped with: diseased claws and fangs.

unit.name: Powerful Volley
unit.description: Each time this model shoots in your Shooting phase , provided it Remained Stationary this turn, all [HEAVY] weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Rapier Carrier This model is equipped with: boltgun; quad heavy bolter; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Even In Death I Serve
unit.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.

composition.description: 1 Relic Contemptor Dreadnought This model is equipped with: 2 heavy plasma cannons; armoured feet.

unit.name: Armoured Spearhead
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and, if that unit is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

composition.description: 1 Sicaran Battle Tank This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Herakles-pattern autocannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Rotating Death
unit.description: This model’s Punisher rotary cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability when targeting INFANTRY units.

composition.description: 1 Sicaran Punisher This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Punisher rotary cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Ferocious Assault
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Sicaran Venator This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Venator neutron laser; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Aerial Assault
unit.description: Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Sokar-pattern Stormbird This model is equipped with: hellstrike missile battery; 3 twin heavy bolters; 4 twin lascannons; armoured hull.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Spartan This model is equipped with: 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Armoured Resilience
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

composition.description: 1 Storm Eagle Gunship This model is equipped with: twin heavy bolter; 2 twin hellstrike launchers; vengeance launcher; armoured hull.

unit.name: Sunderer of Fortresses
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a VEHICLE , improve the Strength and Damage characteristic of that attack by 1 (if that attack targets a FORTIFICATION unit, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead).

composition.description: 1 Typhon This model is equipped with: dreadhammer siege cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Pinning Bombardment
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Scorpius multi-launcher scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test .

composition.description: 1 Whirlwind Scorpius This model is equipped with: Scorpius multi-launcher; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Interceptor
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly , add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Xiphon Interceptor This model is equipped with: 2 twin lascannons; Xiphon missile battery; armoured hull.
